attributes.action: British tax payer refuses to pay the Brexit divorce bill ransom of £40 billions.
attributes.additional_details:
Big government shift on divorce bill to £40bn and future role of European Court of Justice.
https://www.itv.com/news/2017-11-20/big-government-shift-on-divorce-bill-to-40bn-and-future-role-of-european-court-of-justice/

https://www.facebook.com/nigelfarageofficial/posts/1518889838158614?comment_id=724728371071026&notif_id=1511265247822280&notif_t=like

Graham turner quoted: 
NO NO NO Theresa listen to the British people WALK AWAY NOW its our money not there's and NOT yours to fritter away either.
attributes.background: The EU referendum voting results were very clearly, 17.2 million people voted to leave European Union, its custom union, single market and restore British sovereignty. We the British people do not allow the current corrupt and undemocratic Tory government to hand over £40 billions or any money to EU
